name: Isolation Exercises
description: Targeting individual muscles to enhance symmetry, strength, and endurance.

cards.title: Bicep Curl for Arm Development
cards.description: A staple exercise for improving upper arm strength and aesthetics.
bulletpoints: Keep elbows close to the torso while curling the weight
Squeeze the biceps at the top of the movement
Lower the weight slowly to maximize muscle activation
